structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Bonds Of Executors, Administrators, Guardians, Conservators, Trustees And Receivers

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 37. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] A person required by the preceding sections, except section four, to give a bond who, for thirty days after his appointment or after the entry of the decree requiring him to give bond, fails to file the bond, duly approved, may be found to have declined or resigned the trust.
